0.1.4.en: Added FR language support and improved error handling

0.1.5.en: Fixes error when adding devices as non-super user.

0.1.6.en: Fix issue with adding charging stations

0.2.0.en: Adds support for measuring and changing current while charging

0.2.3.en: Fixed issue with setting charger properties.

0.3.0.en: Increase app compatiblity, change device class to evcharger and bugfixes.
